# function: decode_stacks_migration_hash_to_json

This function takes a migration hash string of stack migration as input and decodes it into a structured JSON object for easier processing.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  stack_deployment_details = (
    tfmigrate_stack_migration.stack_migration.migration_hash != "" ?
    provider::tfmigrate::decode_stacks_migration_hash_to_json(
      tfmigrate_stack_migration.stack_migration.migration_hash
    ) : null
  )
}

output "stack_deployment_details" {
  value = local.stack_deployment_details
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
decode_stacks_migration_hash_to_json(migration_hash string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `migration_hash` (String) The migration hash string to be decoded.
